summary: The diff adds a dedicated startup error screen with Retry/Logout/Hard Reload actions, wires it into the appâ€™s startup/auth gate when the caller profile query errors, and implements a best-effort hard reload utility that clears Cache Storage and unregisters service workers before reloading.
